name: Fizfy – Conversion & Sales Software
author: fizfysoftware

sections.description:
Easily Insert Top Header

FIZFY CONVERSION & SALES SOFTWARE PLUGIN

Fizfy Plugin is a simple that lets Insert Pixel Code at Head Tag.No need to edit your theme files!
The simple interface of the Insert Pixel Code in Head Tag gives you one place where you can insert pixel code, rather than dealing with dozens of different plugins.
FEATURES OF FIZFY PLUGIN

  • Registration & Login
  • Quick to set up
  • Simple to insert Fizfy Pixel code
  • Add Google Analytics code to any theme
  • Add custom CSS across themes
  • Insert header code
  • Insert any code or script, including HTML and Javascript
  • Insert Facebook pixel code
sections.installation:
The easy way.

Go to your WordPress Dashboard. Navigate to Plugins > Add New and then search for fizfy Click on Install and then Activate the Plugin.

That’s it, fizfy Plugin is now activated on your site!

The hard way..

Download “fizfy Plugin” and then extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin compatable on latest wordpress and elementor version ?

Yes
